displayName: TypeTalk AI - Advanced Voice Typing & AI Assistant
description:
TypeTalk AI is an intelligent voice typing assistant built specifically for NVDA users.
It leverages advanced Artificial Intelligence and Google Speech Recognition services to provide high-accuracy dictation.
Key features include real-time speech-to-text, automatic grammar correction, punctuation handling, language translation, and emoji support.
This add-on transforms spoken words into polished text, making digital communication seamless and accessible.
changelog:
v1.0 - Initial Official Release
- Introduced Smart Voice Typing using Google Speech Recognition.
- Integrated AI-powered grammar correction and punctuation.
- Added Real-time Translation and Emoji support.
- Implemented Welcome Wizard and Auto-Update system.
